name: Meat 2 Mulch
description:
THIS IS A GAME ABOUT ROOTS ANY WHY THEY ARE BAD

REASON ONE IF YOU TOUCH THEM YOU DIE

REASON TWO THEY WILL CHASE YOUR AROUND THIS FOREST

REASON THREE THEY WANT TO REPLACE YOUR FLESH WITH THEIR MULCH MEAT TO MULCH MEAT TO MULCH MEAT TO MULCH

Created by J Chester for Global Game Jam 2023

Using the  Over 9,000 Hours Diversifier, so everything was made in MS paint.... even the texture maps.
